biography.bio: Jean-Marc Barr was born on September 27, 1960 in Bitburg, Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany. He is an actor and producer, known for Dogville (2003), Breaking the Waves (1996) and Europa (1991).
biography.name: Jean-Marc Barr

biography.bio: Ermin Bravo was born on December 5, 1979 in Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Yugoslavia. He is known for his work on In the Land of Blood and Honey (2011), Remake (2003) and Le choix de Luna (2010).
biography.name: Ermin Bravo

biography.placeOfBirth: Rybachiy, Vilyuchinsk, Kamchatskaya oblast, RSFSR, USSR [now Kamchatskiy kray, Russia]
biography.bio: Grigoriy Dobrygin was born on February 17, 1986 in Rybachiy, Vilyuchinsk, Kamchatskaya oblast, RSFSR, USSR as Grigoriy Eduardovich Dobrygin. He is an actor and director, known for A Most Wanted Man (2014), How I Ended This Summer (2010) and Chernaya Molniya (2009).
biography.name: Grigoriy Dobrygin

biography.bio: Lubna Azabal was born in Brussels, Belgium. She is an actress, known for Paradise Now (2005), Incendies (2010) and Body of Lies (2008).
biography.name: Lubna Azabal

biography.bio: Cristina Flutur was born in Iasi, Romania. She is best-known for playing Alina in the movie Au-delà des collines (2012), directed by the Romanian director Cristian Mungiu. For this role she has received the Award for Best Actress at the International Film Festival at Cannes, in 2012. Au-delà des collines (2012) is the first movie in her career. While studying at the Faculty of Letters, Romanian and English Language and Literature Department, at the "Al. I. Cuza" University in Iasi, Romania, she performs in a theatre company for students, "Ludic" theatre, for 3 years. After graduating, in 2000, she decides to go more seriously into acting and becomes a student in drama at the Faculty of Letters at the "Babes-Bolyai" University in Cluj-Napoca, Romania. After finishing her studies, in 2004, she starts performing on the stage of the "Radu Stanca" National Theatre in Sibiu, Romania, where she works till the summer of 2013, when she moves to Bucharest. From 2004 to 2013 she played in 17 classical and modern theater plays, working with well known and appreciated directors. With the "Radu Stanca" National Theatre she played not only in Romania, but also in other countries: Ukraine, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Finland, Russia, Macedonia, Turkey, Slovenia, Italy, Colombia, Italy.
biography.name: Cristina Flutur

biography.bio: Mila Böhning was born in 2001 in Berlin, German. She is an actress, known for Grain, Hänsel und Gretel (2012) and Tatort (1970).
biography.name: Mila Böhning

biography.bio: Scholastically sound and versed in several languages, Hal Yamanouchi has not lacked for work or means to keep busy. Born in Japan, his collegiate years were dedicated to studying language and literature. He attended the Tokyo University of Foreign Studies as well as the Perugia (Italy) University of Foreign Languages. He began his acting career in 1966 and has appeared in a variety of films and television series on both western and eastern sides of the acting world. His film credits include the Italian-produced Sinbad of the Seven Seas (1989) starring Lou Ferrigno of The Incredible Hulk (1978) TV fame. American audiences may also find him in the undersea adventure comedy The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou (2004) with Bill Murray. He could also be seen in the science fiction action thriller Push (2009). Yamanouchi is not unfamiliar with the stage and has taught theatre and choreographed operas and stage plays. Drawing from his education in languages and literature, he has translated films from Italian to Japanese and vice versa. He has also done work dubbing voices in different languages for other actors.
biography.name: Hal Yamanouchi

biography.bio: Jarreth J. Merz was born on May 1, 1970 in Zurich, Switzerland. He is an actor and director, known for The Passion of the Christ (2004), An African Election (2011) and Ben-Hur (2016).
biography.name: Jarreth J. Merz

biography.bio: Nike Maria Vassil is an actress, known for One Breath (2015), Schwarze Schafe (2015) and Grain.
biography.name: Nike Maria Vassil

biography.bio: Rainer Steffen was born in 1943. He is an actor, known for The Final Solution: The Wannsee Conference (1984), Avalanche Express (1979) and Grain.
biography.name: Rainer Steffen

biography.bio: An actor born and raised in Angola (southwest Africa), Hoji moved to New York in 2008 to pursue a career in acting. He has since been working both in film, TV and theatre in the U.S., Europe and Africa. Hoji is an African-Oscar winner for his performance as César in international crime-drama 'Viva Riva!' (official selection at the 2010 Toronto International Film Festival and 2011 Berlinale, Best African Film at the 2011 MTV Movie Awards). He started his acting career as a comedy actor in Portugal working mainly in TV. In addition to 'Viva Riva!' he performed in 'Meanwhile' from acclaimed indie director Hal Hartley, ABC TV series Pan Am, 'Afronauts' and Brooklyn-based drama 'In The Morning', among other projects. Hoji is also the author of New York for Actors, a e-manual for new and spiring actors wanting to develop their careers in the United States. His diverse and unique cultural background together with his fluency in various languages and a suave and distinguished classic demeanor make him an actor with a remarkable performing signature.
biography.name: Hoji Fortuna

biography.bio: Garrett Thierry is an actor, known for Prayers for Bobby (2009), LeLe: Power (2014) and Lifestone Velocity (2017).
biography.name: Garrett Thierry

biography.bio: Brett Storm is known for his work on Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (2016), Grain and American Sharia (2015).
biography.name: Brett Storm

biography.bio: LaTrallo Presley is an actor, known for The End of the Tour (2015), SJ Dennison Must Die! (2014) and Captain America: The Winter Soldier (2014).
biography.name: LaTrallo Presley

biography.bio: Rose Anne Nepa is a well known actress in Michigan. She was born in Detroit, Michigan, married, has a son, and currently resides in Macomb, Mi. She received her Bachelor degree in Business at Baker College, MI. and studied at The Actors Loft Studio, Royal Oak, Michigan for 2 years. Her talents are in Acting include experience in lead roles, supporting roles, feature films, independent films, short films, voice over, PSA, Commercials and Television shows. She appeared in AMC's TV Series :Low Winter Sun (2013), Hollywood films/Detroit locations: Into the Storm (2014), Batman/Superman (2016), Eloise (2016), and Sparkle. She has a total of 63 films she has acted in. Her roles are very diversified and she enjoys challenging her creativity Christian films are one of her favorites and she has had the an opportunity to work on some of the greatest Christian Film Projects: Lifestone Velocity, Rather to Be Chosen and Who will Move the Stone. Behind the scenes, Rose Anne has experience as a Production Assistant, helped with Producing and is truly an asset to any film project. She is an advocate for "Making Films in Detroit" and encourages out of state film makers to take advantage of the many wonderful locations Detroit City has to offer. She encourages actors to never stop believing in the opportunities Michigan has to offers. Acting is truly her passion.
biography.name: Rose Anne Nepa
